name: south_africa_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetch the South Africa Songs chart information for a specific date range.

date.description: The date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' for which to retrieve the chart information.

range.description: The range of the chart positions to be retrieved.
